snippet.title: Sonic Omens - Final Episodes I Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
📢Sonic Omens with three final episodes is now available for download:
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/SonicOmens/469351
Discord server: https://discord.gg/rnXJyqA
__________________________
Eggman is up to his old tricks again and is after the Chaos Emeralds with Sonic and Tails in hot pursuit! After the incident with Dark Gaia, Robotnik is on the run...but something's not right... Why would he go back to collecting Emeralds with so little effort? Why is G.U.N. sending Shadow after him

But something's not right... Why would he go back to collecting Emeralds with so little effort? Why did the G.U.N. send Shadow after him? And who are these strange monsters that attack everyone who happens to be near the temples?

Only the mysterious figure in the shadows knows the truth. And soon, the Exiled will fulfill his selfish wish.

#SonicOmens #Sonic2022 #Sonic #FinalEpisodes #SonicOmensFinal
